text: Tesaṃ no bhante amhākaṃ hoteva kaṅkhā hoti vicikicchā ko su nāma imesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ āha ko musā ti
edit: Tesaṃ no bhante amhākaṃ hoteva kaṅkhā hoti vicikicchā – ko su nāma imesaṃ bhavataṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ saccaṃ āha ko musā ti?

translations.transtext: Sir, only doubt [and] uncertainty [in] their [views] happens to us thus, "As for such these Venerable ascetics and brahmans, who said the truth, who lied?"
